Relief Aid Ministries
"Faith in Action, Hope in Every Mile"
Tell Me More

About

A short timeline of our history and future plans.

  • November 2024

    Our Humble Beginnings

    Our charity was formed out of a deep commitment to putting faith into action and helping those in need, both locally and globally. Driven by compassion and a desire to make a tangible difference, we aim to provide practical support, hope, and encouragement to individuals and communities facing hardship. By mobilizing resources, donations, and volunteers, we strive to be a source of love and relief in times of crisis, guided by our Christian values and dedication to serving others.

  • January 2025

    Mission aid to Ukraine

    In January 2025, we are sending an articulated lorry loaded with essential supplies to support communities in Ukraine. Our goal is to deliver medical aid, clothing, hygiene products, dried foods, and other vital items to New Life Christian Ministry in Odessa, Ukraine. This 4,500-mile round-trip journey will bring much-needed relief to those facing challenging conditions. We are actively collecting donations at several drop-off points and welcome contributions for fuel and transport costs to help us complete this mission. Join us in making a difference—your support matters more than ever.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!

Our Mission to Ukraine

Read below full details of our mission to Ukraine.

📢 Urgent Appeal for aid for Ukraine – We Need Your Help! 🇺🇦❤️ We are preparing to send an articulated lorry full of vital supplies to Odessa, Ukraine in the new year. The 4,000 mile round trip will take much needed aid to people of all ages affected by the ongoing war, and we need your help to make it possible! We are collecting medical aid, hygiene products, baby items, household detergents and washing powder, toilet rolls, and dried foods to provide crucial support. You can drop off donations at any of the following locations:
📍 Newtownards – 20 Heron Park
📍 Millisle – 205 Abbey Road
📍 Castlewellan – BPS
📍 Newtownards – Powertran
📍 Portavogie, Ardglass & Portavogie harbours – NIFPO
📍 Belfast – Weldpro (opposite Belfast Porsche)
📍 Ballywalter – N G Bells
We are also accepting donations for fuel and transport costs to help cover this long journey. You can sponsor mileage or contribute towards the fuel needed to get these essential supplies to Odessa! For more information or to get involved, contact:
📞 Matthew Marshall – 07703 129290
📞 Ricky Moore – 07743 720048
📞 Mildred Groves – 07934 560302
Every donation counts, and together we can make a big impact. Please share this post and spread the word

Ukraine Update

Hi everyone,
We are collecting medical equipment and vital supplies to go to Ukraine 🇺🇦 in January.
We need help, there are so many ways to help… we need toiletries, incontinence pads, soaps, medical equipment, wheelchairs, dried food, cardboard boxes.
We were so pleased to have received many deliveries from The Malawi Project.
Here is just a taster of what we are doing.

New Drop off Location

📢 New Drop-Off Location in Lisburn for Ukraine Aid! 🇺🇦 We’re excited to announce that A One Autos in Lisburn has generously agreed to be an official drop-off point for our Ukraine aid mission! Thank you to the team at A One Autos for supporting this important cause. You can now drop off medical aid, clothing, hygiene products, dried foods, and more at their location.
📍 A One Autos, Lisburn
Find them on Facebook: A One Autos Here’s a full list of all our drop-off locations:
• Lisburn – A One Autos
• Newtownards – 20 Heron Park
• Millisle – 205 Abbey Road
• Castlewellan – BPS
• Newtownards – Powertran
• Portavogie, Ardglass & Portavogie harbours – NIFPO
• Belfast – Weldpro (opposite Belfast Porsche) As we prepare for the 4,500-mile journey (in the lorry below) to deliver these essential supplies to New Life Christian Ministry in Odessa, Ukraine, we are also accepting donations to cover fuel and transport costs. You can help sponsor mileage or contribute towards fuel to get these supplies to those in need.
Thank you for your generosity and support! For more info, contact:
📞 Matthew Marshall – 07703 129290
📞 Ricky Moore – 07743 720048
📞 Mildred Groves – 07934 560302
Please spread the word and share this post! Together, we can make a difference. #UkraineAid #SupportUkraine #CommunitySupport #LisburnDropOff #AOneAutos #ChurchCommunity #HelpUsHelpThem
